SELECT count(LAW_STU_MEDIA.ID) FROM LAW_COLLECTION,LAW_STU_MEDIA where LAW_COLLECTION.COM_USERID=#{userId} and LAW_COLLECTION.TYPE=10 And LAW_COLLECTION.DEL_STATUS=0 and LAW_COLLECTION.COM_STUCODE = LAW_STU_MEDIA.ID
and LAW_STU_MEDIA.stu_title like '%' || #{stuTitle} || '%'
and LAW_STU_MEDIA.STU_ISSUER like '%' || #{stuIssuer} || '%'
and LAW_STU_MEDIA.STU_LAWID = #{stuLawid}
and LAW_COLLECTION.OPTTIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and LAW_COLLECTION.OPTTIME < = TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and LAW_STU_MEDIA.stu_type = #{stuType}

SELECT id AS "id", stu_code AS "stuCode", stu_title AS "stuTitle", com_content AS "comContent", stu_describe AS "stuDescribe", stu_time AS "stuTime", video_pic_acc AS "videoPicAcc"， stu_creat AS "stuCreat", stu_Issuer AS "stuIssuer", stu_Issdepartment AS "stuIssdepartment", stu_Optdepartment AS "stuOptdepartment", stu_Policeclass AS "stuPoliceclass", stu_From AS "stuFrom", stu_Type AS "stuType", stu_Knowledge AS "stuKnowledge", stu_Lawid AS "stuLawid", user_Name AS "userName", dept_Name AS "deptName" FROM LAW_STU_MEDIA WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT A . ID AS dataId, A . ID AS infoId, A .STU_CODE AS infoCode, A .STU_TITLE AS infoName, A .STU_LAWID AS infoParentId, 'stu_' || A .stu_type || '_data' AS infoType FROM LAW_STU_MEDIA A
where A.DEL_STATUS = 0
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{dataId},A .STU_LAWID) > 0
AND A .stu_type = #{infoType}
union ALL
SELECT A .ID AS dataId, 'case_'||A.case_type||'_'||A.ID AS infoId, A .CASE_CODE AS infoCode, A .CASE_TITLE AS infoName, A.case_Lawid, 'case_'||A.content_type||'_data' AS infoType FROM LAW_CASE_ANALYSIS A where A.DEL_STATUS = 0
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{dataId},A .case_Lawid) > 0
AND A .content_type = #{infoType}
